roman.cwk.managedbeans

Class OrganizationBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • roman.cwk.managedbeans.BaseBean
      • roman.cwk.managedbeans.OrganizationBean

  • public class OrganizationBean
extends BaseBean
    Controller, managed bean for organization and registration of new user. Adds error messages to the view if necessary.
